Sentencas: NiO/Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ) composites which is widely used as anode in solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) has been prepared using microwaveassisted combustion technique.
Titulo: Studies on electrical properties of microwave assisted synthesis of NiO/YSZ composites for high - performance anode in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Different concentrations of NiO has been added to determine the optimum loading.
Titulo: Studies on electrical properties of microwave assisted synthesis of NiO/YSZ composites for high - performance anode in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: From the XRD results, it was clear that there was no formation of secondary phases in the product.
Titulo: Studies on electrical properties of microwave assisted synthesis of NiO/YSZ composites for high - performance anode in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Further, the obtained microstructure and electrical properties of the NiO/YSZ (NYZ) composite material was almost the same as that obtained through other methods of synthesis.
Titulo: Studies on electrical properties of microwave assisted synthesis of NiO/YSZ composites for high - performance anode in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, it was attained in a shorter duration and at low cost, which is an added advantage of this process.
Titulo: Studies on electrical properties of microwave assisted synthesis of NiO/YSZ composites for high - performance anode in solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: This research opens up a new horizon for the synthesis of novel ceramic electrode materials for SOFC application using microwaves.
Titulo: Studies on electrical properties of microwave assisted synthesis of NiO/YSZ composites for high - performance anode in solid oxide fuel cell
